thread.title: Gossip Girl Star Surprises Everyone With An Unexpected Wedding!
thread.title_full: Gossip Girl Star Surprises Everyone With An Unexpected Wedding!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Gossip Girl Star Surprises Everyone With An Unexpected Wedding!
text:
2/27/2017 5:00 PM ET | Filed under: Love Line • Penn Badgley • Wedding Waltz 
Congrats to these lovebirds! 
Related: Penn Goes Blonde! 
A source confirms to E! News that the pair were wed in a Brooklyn courthouse Monday afternoon with family and friends in attendance. How sweet! 
A pal shared the photo (above) of the beaming Penn and Domino (who is also Jemima and Lola Kirke 's sister) right after they said their vows. 
Don't they look ecstatic? Especially Domino! It's obviously the happiest day of her life! 
Jemima also shared this lovely photo of her with her newlywed sister: 
We wish these two all the best! Congrats again!
